text: Richard Coogan (April 4, 1914 - March 12, 2014) was an American actor. He is best known for his role as Captain Video in Captain Video and His Video Rangers from 1949 to 1950. He was also known for his role in The Californians. Coogan died in Beverly Hills, California from natural causes, aged 99.Richard Coogan obituary ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1914 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New Jersey
title: Richard Coogan
